argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b c

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nfrecs.f | |- F/_ x F |
| 2 |  | #P_df-recs | |- recs ( F ) = U. { a | E. b e. On ( a Fn b /\ A. c e. b ( a ` c ) = ( F ` ( a |` c ) ) ) } |
| 3 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x On |
| 4 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ x a Fn b |
| 5 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x b |
| 6 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x ( a |` c ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_nffv | |- F/_ x ( F ` ( a |` c ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_nfeq2 | |- F/ x ( a ` c ) = ( F ` ( a |` c ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_nfral | |- F/ x A. c e. b ( a ` c ) = ( F ` ( a |` c ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_nfan | |- F/ x ( a Fn b /\ A. c e. b ( a ` c ) = ( F ` ( a |` c ) ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_nfrex | |- F/ x E. b e. On ( a Fn b /\ A. c e. b ( a ` c ) = ( F ` ( a |` c ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_nfab | |- F/_ x { a | E. b e. On ( a Fn b /\ A. c e. b ( a ` c ) = ( F ` ( a |` c ) ) ) } |
| 13 | 12 | #P_nfuni | |- F/_ x U. { a | E. b e. On ( a Fn b /\ A. c e. b ( a ` c ) = ( F ` ( a |` c ) ) ) } |
| 14 | 2, 13 | #P_nfcxfr | |- F/_ x recs ( F ) |
